column4: hi...I've a query...like we get open office & fire fox as preinstalled...how do I add any other?
with synaptic & aptitude, i can install later...i mean customizing so that even say google chrome comes pre-installed...
look at the chromium-browser package, along with chromium-codecs-ffmpeg and chromium-codecs-ffmpeg-nonfree
i think i use a custom ppa for chromium but i forget what it is
